title: Integrate context pointers into ToolContextManager
description: Wire FileContextPointerStore + ContextRelevanceSelector into llm_common.agents.ToolContextManager so apps can load selected tool outputs instead of dumping all context.
acceptance_criteria:
- ToolContextManager.save_context also persists context pointers (meta+result)
- New helper to select + format relevant contexts for a query
- Unit tests
- Released as v0.7.1
close_reason: Implemented and merged (PR #23) and released as v0.7.1/v0.7.2

title: DOCS/BEADS: Issue hygiene + jules packets
description: Close confirmed-stale issues and create docs packets/tech plans for all P0/P1 + jules-ready + needs-user-input items.
acceptance_criteria: - .beads/issues.jsonl reflects closures/updates\n- New docs packets exist for focus issues

title: SHARED_AGENT_CONTRACTS_AND_PRIMITIVES
description: llm-common workstream for shared agent/runtime contract unification across affordabot + prime-radiant-ai. Focus: stable contracts (ToolResult/provenance, optional StreamEvent), shared primitives (ToolSelector, pointer store), versioning, and publish pinned releases.
design: Deliverables: (1) contract docs and schemas; (2) additive-only within a major; (3) release tag(s) and changelog; (4) migration notes for app repos; (5) keep framework-agnostic (Affordabot Next.js + Prime Vite remain).

title: DOCS_FRONTEND_UNIFICATION_WORKSTREAM
description: Create llm-common workstream spec for frontend stack unification and agent contract stabilization; includes Jules-dispatchable tasks and dependency mapping.
acceptance_criteria: Docs exist under docs/ in llm-common with clear contracts, release plan, and task breakdown.
notes: Initialized Beads in llm-common; mirroring canonical spec and creating contract/release tasks.
close_reason: Beads initialized; spec committed; ready for PR

title: DEXTER_PORTS_CORE_PRIMITIVES
description: Provide shared, reusable implementations of Dexter portability wins in llm-common: (1) Tool selection helper and config (default glm-4.5-air), (2) context pointer store + relevance selection, (3) MessageHistory summaries + relevance selection. Apps consume via tagged release.
acceptance_criteria: 1) APIs exist in llm-common with tests. 2) JSON schemas published for any new contracts. 3) Release tag published and both apps can pin.
notes: Jules-Ready: partial (umbrella integration tracker). Dispatch: docs/bd-llm-common-cmm/JULES_DISPATCH.md. Prefer dispatching child tasks first (llm-common-cmm.11, llm-common-cmm.12).

title: TOOL_SELECTION_HELPER_AND_MODEL_CONFIG
description: Add a shared ToolSelector helper to llm-common: schema-grounded tool selection using a dedicated small model (default: glm-4.5-air). Provide a stable config surface (env vars) and tests.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Library API exists with tests. 2) Default tool-selection model is glm-4.5-air. 3) Apps can override model via config. 4) Fallback policy is bounded and safe (no 'select all tools' default). 5) Release notes + JSON schema updated if needed.
close_reason: Completed: v0.7.3 release/tag + schema artifacts + StreamEvent contract + tool selector helper merged

title: CONTEXT_POINTER_STORE_AND_RELEVANCE_SELECTION_LIBRARY
description: Provide a shared context pointer store + relevance selection helper in llm-common (Dexter-style), so both apps share storage format and selection logic.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Library API exists with tests. 2) Pointer format documented (hashing, metadata). 3) Relevance selection helper exists with structured output schema. 4) Apps can adopt incrementally.
close_reason: Implemented in ToolContextManager + pointer store + relevance selector; released as v0.7.2 and adopted in both apps

title: CONTRACT_TOOLRESULT_PROVENANCE
description: Stabilize ToolResult + provenance/evidence contract used by app frontends.
acceptance_criteria: Single documented contract; additive changes only; apps can pin release.
close_reason: Completed via PR #27 (Contract: ToolResult + provenance v1 schemas)

title: CONTRACT_STREAM_EVENT_SCHEMA_OPTIONAL
description: Define optional streaming event contract (StreamEvent) shared across apps if/when streaming is enabled.
acceptance_criteria: Documented schema and example event sequences.
close_reason: Completed: v0.7.3 release/tag + schema artifacts + StreamEvent contract + tool selector helper merged

title: RELEASE_AND_PINNING_PLAN
description: Cut llm-common release tag and provide pinning instructions for affordabot/prime; eliminate branch-based pins.
acceptance_criteria: New tag published; both repos pinned; scripts updated.
close_reason: Completed: v0.7.3 release/tag + schema artifacts + StreamEvent contract + tool selector helper merged

title: DEXTER_AUDIT_REFRESH_AND_REWRITE_SPEC_UPDATES
description: Refresh and expand the Dexter audit (local ~/dexter) and update llm-common-cmm workstream spec with missed integration ideas + low-hanging fruit (contracts, provenance, context selection, message history). Docs-only PR.
acceptance_criteria: 1) docs/bd-llm-common-cmm/DEXTER_AUDIT.md added. 2) docs/bd-llm-common-cmm/SPEC.md updated with concrete adoption items and decisions. 3) New Jules-dispatchable Beads tasks added/linked.
close_reason: Dexter audit refreshed and rewrite specs updated (docs-only PR)

title: LLM_COMMON_VERSION_TAG_ALIGNMENT
description: Align llm-common pyproject.toml version with the latest released tag and define a single release/versioning source of truth.
acceptance_criteria: 1) pyproject.toml version matches latest tag. 2) Release process documented. 3) Apps can pin tags confidently.
close_reason: Completed: v0.7.3 release/tag + schema artifacts + StreamEvent contract + tool selector helper merged

title: LLM_COMMON_PUBLISH_JSON_SCHEMA_ARTIFACTS
description: Publish JSON Schema artifacts for canonical contracts (advisor request/response envelope, EvidenceEnvelope, StreamEvent optional) as part of llm-common releases.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Release contains versioned JSON schema files. 2) Both app repos consume schemas for frontend validation/typegen.
close_reason: Completed: v0.7.3 release/tag + schema artifacts + StreamEvent contract + tool selector helper merged

title: LLM_COMMON_MESSAGE_HISTORY_HELPER
description: Implement a Dexter-style MessageHistory helper: summarize answers and select relevant prior turns via structured output. Keep it optional and backend-agnostic.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Library API exists with tests. 2) Demonstrated usage in at least one app.
notes: Library implemented + merged (llm-common#39). Released as llm-common v0.7.5 tag. Remaining acceptance: demonstrate usage in an app (tracking in prime-radiant-ai bd-d7l7 / Jules session 15760309866269394898).
close_reason: Implemented + released in llm-common v0.7.5; demonstrated usage in prime-radiant-ai via stars-end/prime-radiant-ai#506 (MessageHistory unit test + pin).

title: DEXTER_PORTS_BUNDLE_SPEC_AND_TASKS
description: Docs-only: bundle Dexter port ideas (small-model tool selection via glm-4.5-air, context pointer store+relevance selection, message history summaries) into llm-common workstream spec with Jules-ready tasks.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Spec updated. 2) Jules-ready tasks created with explicit dependencies. 3) glm-4.5-air decision recorded.
close_reason: Bundled Dexter ports into spec and created Jules-ready tasks

title: Dexter RAG V2: llm-common Upgrade
description: Port Dexter's agentic patterns to llm-common: UnderstandPhase, ReflectPhase, IterativeOrchestrator, and streaming enhancements. Foundation for Prime Radiant and Affordabot RAG integration.

title: A1: UnderstandPhase
description: Create UnderstandPhase for intent/entity extraction. JULES_READY=true. Tasks: A1.1-A1.6 (schemas, implementation, tests). Est: 2h

title: A1.1 Create llm_common/agents/phases/__init__.py
description: Create llm_common/agents/phases/__init__.py exporting UnderstandPhase/ReflectPhase schemas.

title: A1.2 Create Entity/Understanding Pydantic schemas
description: Add Entity and Understanding schemas (intent + entities list) for UnderstandPhase.

title: A1.3 Implement UnderstandPhase with LLM call
description: Implement UnderstandPhase.run() with response_format json_object and robust fallback behavior.

title: A1.4 Add system prompt for intent/entity extraction
description: Add dedicated system prompt for query understanding and entity extraction.

title: A1.5 Add tests/agents/phases/test_understand.py
description: Unit tests for UnderstandPhase using mock LLM client.

title: A1.6 Add mock LLM fixtures
description: Mock LLM fixtures for deterministic unit tests (json_object responses).

title: A2: ReflectPhase
description: Create ReflectPhase for completeness evaluation with 2-iteration limit. JULES_READY=true. Tasks: A2.1-A2.6 (schemas, implementation, tests). Est: 2.5h

title: A2.1 Create ReflectionResult Pydantic schema
description: Add ReflectionResult schema: is_complete, reasoning, missing_info, suggested_next_steps.

title: A2.2 Implement ReflectPhase (max_iterations=2)
description: Implement ReflectPhase.run() with 2-iteration limit + conservative completion evaluation.

title: A2.3 Add system prompt for completeness evaluation
description: Add system prompt guiding completeness evaluation.

title: A2.4 Implement build_planning_guidance()
description: Implement build_planning_guidance(reflection) for next iteration planning.

title: A2.5 Add tests/agents/phases/test_reflect.py
description: Unit tests for ReflectPhase using mock LLM responses.

title: A2.6 Test forced completion at max iterations
description: Ensure ReflectPhase forces completion when max iterations reached (watch off-by-one).

title: B1: IterativeOrchestrator
description: Full Dexter-style orchestrator with Understand->Plan->Execute->Reflect loop. Depends on A1+A2. Tasks: B1.1-B1.7. Est: 4.5h

title: B1.1 Create llm_common/agents/orchestrator.py
description: Create orchestrator module implementing Dexter Understand→Plan→Execute→Reflect loop.

title: B1.X Streaming executor should run tools in parallel
description: AgenticExecutor.run_stream currently executes tool calls sequentially; parallelize while still streaming per-tool events.

title: B1.X Stream evidence envelope events
description: Ensure IterativeOrchestrator.run_stream yields evidence/source events (and/or final envelope) for downstream SSE consumers.

title: B1.2 Implement full iteration loop
description: Implement Understand→Plan→Execute→Reflect loop with max_iterations=2; ensure planner guidance propagates.

title: B1.3 Add _format_completed_work() helper
description: Add helper to format completed work for reflection prompt.

title: B1.4 Add _format_guidance() helper
description: Add helper to format reflection output into next-iteration planning guidance.

title: B1.5 Wire EvidenceEnvelope collection
description: Collect EvidenceEnvelope(s) from tool results and return evidence_envelope in OrchestratorResult; ensure it matches ToolResult.evidence shapes.

title: B1.6 Create tests/agents/test_orchestrator.py
description: Unit tests for IterativeOrchestrator (non-streaming) with mock tools/LLM.

title: B1.7 Integration test with mock tools
description: Integration test covering multiple iterations and evidence aggregation.

title: B1.X Fix evidence merge with executor result types
description: Fix mismatch: AgenticExecutor returns dict-wrapped outputs/SubTaskResult, but orchestrator expects result.evidence; ensure evidence_envelope is actually populated.

title: B1.X Fix reflect max-iteration off-by-one
description: ReflectPhase force-complete condition is unreachable with range(max_iterations); fix logic and add regression test.

title: C1: ZaiClient Streaming Enhancement
description: Add tool_stream=True for GLM-4.7, handle reasoning_content and delta.tool_calls. JULES_READY=true. Tasks: C1.1-C1.6. Est: 2.5h

title: C1.1 Add tool_stream param to streaming
description: Add tool_stream=True parameter to ZaiClient streaming completion method per spec.

title: C1.2 Handle delta.reasoning_content
description: Parse GLM-4.7 reasoning_content deltas into StreamChunk.

title: C1.3 Handle delta.tool_calls assembly
description: Assemble streamed tool_calls with index-based accumulation (arguments concatenation).

title: C1.4 Create StreamChunk dataclass
description: Add typed StreamChunk data model for content/reasoning/tool_calls.

title: C1.5 Add streaming tests with mocks
description: Unit tests for streaming parsing using mock OpenAI stream chunks.

title: C1.6 Document streaming API
description: Docstrings/examples for tool_stream + reasoning content usage.

title: C1.X Resolve API naming: stream_completion vs stream_completion_enhanced
description: Spec expects stream_completion(tool_stream=True); decide whether to replace/alias stream_completion_enhanced and update exports/callers.

title: C2: Exports and Release v0.5.0
description: Update __init__.py exports, bump version, update CHANGELOG. Tasks: C2.1-C2.5. Est: 1h

title: C2.1 Export new agent primitives
description: Update llm_common/agents/__init__.py to export phases/orchestrator/StreamChunk.

title: C2.2 Version bump for Dexter RAG V2
description: Bump version to 0.5.0 (or reconcile with current 0.7.x) in pyproject.toml; ensure downstream pinning story.

title: C2.3 Update CHANGELOG.md
description: Update CHANGELOG.md with Dexter RAG V2 features; keep semantic version ordering consistent.

title: C2.4 Run full test suite and lint
description: Run pytest + ruff/black (or make verify) before release.

title: C2.5 Create PR and merge
description: Human: create PR and merge to master; tag release for downstream.

title: C2.X Fix pyproject/changelog version inconsistency
description: Currently pyproject.toml is 0.7.5 but changelog includes 0.5.0; decide canonical versioning and fix ordering/tags.

title: Fix duplicate pyyaml in pyproject.toml (breaks Poetry installs)
description: pyproject.toml contains duplicate pyyaml dependency (required + optional), causing TOMLDecodeError 'Cannot overwrite a value'. Blocks downstream repos from updating llm-common.
acceptance_criteria: - pyproject.toml parses\n- poetry install/update works\n- Release v0.7.2
close_reason: Fixed and merged (PR #24) and released as v0.7.2
